A few had days passed since Akane's Jinriki\ncame back.%K%P
And our relationship was moving along quite nicely.%K%P
And a couple of other things had changed, too.%K%P
Akane had started to become really clingy,\nand whenever she had a spare moment,\nshe'd pop into my room.%K%P
'Hey!'%K%P
'You really stick to me like glue.'%K%P
'This way I can feel you with my whole body.\nYou don't mind, do you?'%K%P
'I guess not.'%K%P
As Akane squeezed in closer reading a manga, her\nwhole body quivered like it tickled.%K%P
'What are you reading?'%K%P
'It's a romance manga I borrowed from Maika.\nI thought it might help.'%K%P
I sneaked a look at it as she read intently.\nThe main character and heroine were on a date.%K%P
'Hmm.'%K%P
A date...%K%P
You know, we haven't gone out, just the two of us,\nsince we started dating.%K%P
'Hey, Akane. Why don't we go on a date?'%K%P
Akane looked up at me in shock.%K%P
'A date?! Let's go, let's go!'%K%P
Akane's eyes gleamed with excitement\nand I was glad I'd asked.%K%P
'Is there somewhere in particular you'd like to go?'%K%P
'Somewhere to go... Hmmm...'%K%P
She put down the manga and folded her arms\nin thought.%K%P
It was a spur-of-the-moment question,\nbut she was so serious...%K%P
'We don't have to decide right now.\nWe can think about it later.'%K%P
'...Oh, I know! Let's go to the shopping street!'%K%P
'Huh? Don't you want to go someplace more\nspecial? It is a date, after all.'%K%P
'No, I want our first date to be here in town!'%K%P
'Is that bad?'%K%P
Akane cocked her head and looked at me\nwith upturned eyes.%K%P
There was only one possible answer.%K%P
'Of course not. Actually, there are shops\nand places I'd like to take you to.'%K%P
'Yay! So, is it set?'%K%P
'Yeah, of course it is!'%K%P
'All right, a shopping street date it is!\nCan we go right now?'%K%P
'Sorry, today I've got to help Maika after lunch.\nLet's go out tomorrow.'%K%P
'Aw, too bad. I guess if you promised to help,\nthen you can't avoid it.'%K%P
Akane looked disappointed, but she didn't complain,\nand brightened up right away.%K%P
'It's definitely on for tomorrow, right?\nI'm so excited!'%K%P
'Me too.'%K%P
My face began to relax as I thought about it.%K%P
Tomorrow I'd have to be the perfect escort.%K%P
